attributes.action: oppose the extension of the Congestion Charge into Norwich as it is unfair, unworkable and undesirable
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Council are currently spending roughly £500,000 of taxpayers money looking at introducting a congestion charge into Norwich.  We believe this move would hit the elderly, families and disabled the hardest.  We also believe it to be unworkable in a City as small as Norwich.  We know it will be unpopular with residents who won't want to pay to drive into their own City.  Please join us in opposing this scheme.
